articles.title: Discussion on Foul Baiting
articles.original_title: Discussion on Foul Baiting
articles.summary: First of all I am new to basketball. I started following Luka, and ended up being a Laker fan now. Now to the point, I have seen soooo many fans talk about foul baiting and blame the players for it. Now I see Cade too blame them for it. They even talk about how it is unethical. I find this discussion stupid, because first of all its a team sport, you gonna do anything in your hands to make it up for your team, easier the better.
